Dear Harry,
Have been after George Probst
almost weekly but nothing happens. I got
the stuff to him very promptly. In his
favor, he did run into lots of work when
Kettering died, etc but I am worried too.
If I pulled it out of there how quickly
could you put it ou« All copy has been
edrtgd and approved by the participants
and should be ready to publish, though
George said Just the other day when I
was after him again that some further
editing needed to be done. I»m sort of
in the middle here. Any ideas?
Sincerely,
Jo,™* be very honest with you I don’t
think a hell of a lot has been done yet
